short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for the Assertiv Identity and Access Management platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Assertiv Access Manager is an extension to the Assertiv Identity and Access Management platform. It allows you to easily access your Password Vault, Personal Apps and Corporate SSO (SAML/OpenID Connect) enabled applications with only a few clicks.

This browser extension by Assertiv offers the following capability:

* View your personal and shared passwords/credentials for easy access
* Connect passwords to personal apps to simplify authentication
* Quickly initiate federated sign on to your corporate systems

This extension requires an Assertiv account to authenticate and use it's functionality.
